tokenExchange.userNotFound: User not found. Please sign up first.
tokenExchange.userNotFoundMessage: The user account for this email does not exist. Please create an account first.

signupSuccess.title: Account Ready!
signupSuccess.message: Your account is ready to use.
signupSuccess.noFurtherAction: No further action needed. You can now access all features.

welcome.rentPortalDescription: Manage your community, properties and services with ease. Connect with your neighbors and enjoy harmonious community living.

home.heroDescription: Join your neighborhood's digital community platform. Manage properties, connect with neighbors, and access community services all in one place.
home.feature1Description: Announcements, useful info, newsletter and directories to stay informed about your condominium life.
home.feature2Description: Chat, shared Drive and applications to facilitate exchanges between neighbors.
home.feature3Description: Reservation and management of shared spaces, coordination of common equipment.
home.ctaDescription: Join your community today and experience the future of neighborhood living.

search.placeholder: What object are you looking for?

profile.ssoPasswordInfo: SSO is enabled. Password management is not available when SSO is active.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Add properties you own as an owner or occupy as a tenant.

profile.completionRequired: Your profile must be completed before using the service. Please fill in all required fields and complete the units section.
profile.phoneInfo: We encourage you to provide your phone number. In case of water damage or emergency, this will allow us to contact you quickly.
profile.profileSharingConsent: Allow profile sharing in community directory
profile.profileSharingConsentDescription: When enabled, your basic profile information (name, apartment number, contact details) will be visible to other community members in the residents directory. This helps neighbors connect and communicate more easily.

list.title: Space booking
list.subtitle: Book shared spaces in your eco-neighborhood

stripeDemoMode.title: Stripe Demo Mode Enabled
stripeDemoMode.message: You are in demo mode. Use the following information to test payment:

admin.title: Space management
admin.subtitle: Manage spaces available for reservation
admin.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this space?
admin.confirmDeactivate: Are you sure you want to deactivate this space?
admin.name: Name
admin.ownerPriceHelp: Daily price for owners (0 = free for owners)
admin.uploadImages: Drag and drop images or click to select
admin.uploadImagesHint: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, WebP. Max size: 10MB per image
admin.generalRulesPlaceholder: Describe the general rules for using the space...
admin.safetyInstructionsPlaceholder: Describe the safety instructions to follow...

admin.title: TTLock Management
admin.description: Manage TTLock access devices connected to the system
admin.noDevicesDescription: Start by adding your first TTLock device to manage space access.

admin.cleaningEnabledHelp: Enable integration with a cleaning company for this space
admin.cleaningEmailHelp: Email address of the cleaning company that will receive notifications
admin.cleaningNotificationsEnabledHelp: Send emails to the cleaning company on confirmations, reminders, and cancellations
admin.cleaningCalendarEnabledHelp: Generate a shared iCalendar feed for the cleaning company
admin.cleaningDaysAfterCheckoutHelp: Number of days after guest checkout to perform cleaning (0 = checkout day)
admin.cleaningHourHelp: Time when cleaning should be performed (HH:MM format)
admin.cleaningCalendarUrlHelp: Copy this URL to add it to your calendar (Google Calendar, Outlook, etc.)
admin.reservationCalendarHelp: iCalendar URL containing all reservations for this space

settings.title: Space Settings
settings.platformFeeHelp: These fees cover Stripe processing costs (ex: 1.9% + 0.25€)

payment.title: Reservation payment

users.confirmDeleteContent: Are you sure you want to delete this user?

users.confirmDisableContent: Are you sure you want to disable this user?

emailConfirmation.title: Email Confirmation
emailConfirmation.successMessage: Your email address has been successfully verified. You can now sign in to your account.
emailConfirmation.redirectingMessage: Your email has been verified. You will be redirected to the login page.
emailConfirmation.errorMessage: An error occurred while verifying your email. Please try again.

emailPending.title: Email Verification Pending
emailPending.message: Your account has been created successfully! Please verify your email address to activate your account.

instructions.title: Instructions:
instructions.step1: Check your email inbox (and spam folder)
instructions.step2: Click the verification link in the email
instructions.step3: Come back here to sign in

emailPending.helpText: If you don't receive the email within 5 minutes, check your spam folder or contact support.

errors.title: Error
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to access this page. Please log in again.

auth001.title: User Not Found
auth001.message: The specified user could not be found.
auth001.action: Please check the provided information and try again.

auth002.title: Invalid Credentials
auth002.message: The provided username or password is incorrect.
auth002.action: Please check your credentials and try again.

auth003.title: Email Already Verified
auth003.message: This email address has already been verified.
auth003.action: You can proceed to sign in.

auth004.title: Invalid Verification
auth004.message: The verification token is invalid or has expired.
auth004.action: Please request a new verification email.

auth005.title: Insufficient Permissions
auth005.message: You don't have sufficient permissions to perform this action.
auth005.action: Please contact an administrator if you need access.

auth006.title: User Already Exists
auth006.message: A user with this {{field}} already exists.
auth006.action: Please use a different {{field}} or try signing in instead.

auth007.title: Auth0 Registration Failed
auth007.message: Failed to register user in Auth0. Please try again later.
auth007.action: If the problem persists, please contact support.

auth008.title: Auth0 Token Error
auth008.message: Failed to get access token from Auth0. Please try again later.
auth008.action: If the problem persists, please contact support.

auth009.title: Invalid Email Format
auth009.message: The email address format is invalid.
auth009.action: Please enter a valid email address.

auth010.title: Weak Password
auth010.message: Password does not meet security requirements: {{reason}}

auth011.title: Username Too Short
auth011.message: Username must be at least 3 characters long.

auth012.title: Invalid Username Characters
auth012.message: Username contains invalid characters. Only letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens are allowed.
auth012.action: Please choose a username with valid characters only.

auth013.title: Database Save Error
auth013.message: Failed to save user to database. Please try again.
auth013.action: If the problem persists, please contact support.

auth014.title: Email Verification Token Error
auth014.message: Failed to create email verification token. Please try again.
auth014.action: If the problem persists, please contact support.

auth015.title: Email Send Error
auth015.message: Failed to send verification email. Please try again later.
auth015.action: You can request a new verification email from your profile.

auth016.title: Auth0 User Delete Error
auth016.message: Failed to delete user from Auth0 during rollback. Please contact support.
auth016.action: Please contact support to resolve this issue.

auth017.title: Email Already Exists
auth017.message: This email is already used by another user.
auth017.action: Please use a different email address.

auth018.title: User Not Found for SSO
auth018.message: User not found for SSO login. Please sign up first.
auth018.action: Please create an account before using SSO login.

auth019.title: Auth0 Linking Failed
auth019.action: Please try again later or contact support.
